analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol:
	Contract PoWAdvCoinToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#379-380)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

PoWAdvCoinToken._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#122)
PoWAdvCoinToken._BLOCK_REWARD should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#126)
PoWAdvCoinToken._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#130-132)
PoWAdvCoinToken._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#127-129)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#222:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'challenge_digest' of PoWAdvCoinToken.mint (/unique_chucks/6/0x1a136ae98b49b92841562b6574d1f3f5b0044e4c.sol#173) is not in mixedCase
